enchantment.maenchants.curse_butterfinge: 当你的工具挖掘或攻击时有几率掉落.
在水里将会持续受到伤害.
enchantment.maenchants.reinforced_tip.de: 增加挖掘黑曜石的速度.
enchantment.maenchants.stone_mending.des: 挖掘石头时有几率恢复耐久.
enchantment.maenchants.momentum.desc: 连续挖掘同样方块的时候增加挖掘速度.
enchantment.maenchants.true_shot.desc: 射出的箭不受重力影响.
enchantment.maenchants.paralysis.desc: 攻击时造成麻痹效果,限制移动,跳跃和攻击.
enchantment.maenchants.combo.desc: 连续攻击时提高伤害,攻击到空气或者方块时重置效果.
enchantment.maenchants.lifesteal.desc: 根据造成的伤害回复生命值.
enchantment.maenchants.wisdom.desc: 杀死生物时获得更多经验值
enchantment.maenchants.blazing_walker.de: 行走时暂时将岩浆变为圆石.
enchantment.maenchants.step_assist.desc: 可以行走上1格高的方块而无需跳跃.
enchantment.maenchants.multi_jump.desc: 可以在空气中连续跳跃.
death.attack.death: %s can not handle power of this item
enchantment.maenchants.curse_death.desc: Deals massive amount of damage when equipped or held in hand.
enchantment.maenchants.soft_fall.desc: Eliminates falling damage, downside is that it gives exhaustion.
enchantment.maenchants.timeless.desc: Item with this enchant with not despawn after time when dropped on ground.
